name: record-shop-fullsteak
description: frontend und backend gleichzeitig laufen lassen

scripts.dependencies: git clone https://github.com/ulzq/record-shop-fullsteak; cd record-shop-fullsteak; git submodule init; git submodule update; cd record-shop-backend; git checkout task/05-mongoose-controllers-solution; cd ..; yarn install; yarn install-all
scripts.install-all: ( cd record-shop-backend; yarn install; ); ( cd record-shop-frontend; yarn install; );

author: fbw9@dus
